description: BitContract is a Bitcoin-first contract toolkit. Define agreements in a readable policy file (thresholds, timelocks, vault stages, escrow conditions, and oracle-triggered payouts). The compiler emits Miniscript descriptors and PSBT templates. Operators can simulate paths, verify safety constraints (e.g., no stuck funds), and export reproducible build artifacts. Optional DLC modules enable oracle-driven settlement without revealing internals. Everything is transparent, testable, and reproducible.
